attributes.action: promote equal rights to paye tax payers either scrap paye or include everyone in it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: small busineses, individuals, can pay themselves a wage that will allow maximun benifits to be claimed.then pay again themselves a dividend which while below £14000 attracks tax at 10% so on.tax need not be so taxing one set of rules for all scrap paye or tax us all the same.
